title: Philip J. Weiser Endowed Scholarship Fund
description: To provide scholarship awards for students enrolled in the Law School at the University of Colorado Boulder who have a commitment to public service, a record of entrepreneurial initiative,  leadership, academic achievement and intellectual curiosity.
marketingContent: To provide scholarship awards for students enrolled in the Law School at the University of Colorado Boulder who have a commitment to public service, a record of entrepreneurial initiative, leadership, academic achievement and intellectual curiosity.
